Title: dbt uses a SQLparse version with a high vulnerability
Description: Using a version of `sqlparse` that has a security vulnerability and no way to update in current version of dbt core. Snyk recommends using `sqlparse==0.5` but this causes a conflict with dbt. Snyk states the issues is a recursion error: `SNYK-PYTHON-SQLPARSE-6615674`.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.6.0 before 1.6.13, all versions starting from 1.7.0 before 1.7.13
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.6.0, all versions starting from 1.6.13 before 1.7.0, all versions starting from 1.7.13
